table.name: gtm_transaction_line_note
table.description: This table is intended to hold the notes that gives information about the result of the actions/events performed on a transaction line.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: TIMESTAMP
columns.description: Timestamp of the event that is noted.

columns.name: SUMMARY
columns.description: High level description about the event.

columns.name: ENTERED_BY
columns.description: The action name or the manual intervention that resulted in this note

columns.name: IS_SYSTEM_GENERATED
columns.description: Says if the note is generated by the system or manually added by the user.
